.pull-right[

```{r, message=F, warning=F}

lines <- surv %>% 
  group_by(hospital,
           week_report = lubridate::floor_date(date_onset, "week")) %>% 
  summarise(n_cases = n()) %>% 
  drop_na(week_report) %>% 
  ggplot(
    mapping = aes(
      x = week_report,       
      y = n_cases,
      color = hospital),
    size = 4
    )+
  geom_line()+
  labs(title = "geom_line()")+
  theme_minimal(base_size = 16)

bars <- surv %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(
      y = gender,
      fill = gender))+
  geom_bar()+
  labs(title = "geom_bar()")+
  theme_minimal(base_size = 16)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")

cowplot::plot_grid(lines, bars,
                   nrow = 2, rel_widths = c(2,2))


```

]

```{r, echo=params$lang == "en", eval=F}
surv %>% 
  # get weekly counts by hospital
  count(
     hospital,
     week = floor_date(date_onset, "week")) %>%

  # plot
  ggplot(
    mapping = aes(
      x = week,
      y = n,
      color = hospital)) +
  geom_line() +

  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
